quote: Madame, I believe the greatest sin against God is to be false. If one is not true to one's self, then it is impossible to be true to God. I bear you no ill will for following your heart.
quote_letters: MADAME I BELIEVE THE GREATEST SIN AGAINST GOD IS TO BE FALSE IF ONE IS NOT TRUE TO ONES SELF THEN IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO BE TRUE TO GOD I BEAR YOU NO ILL WILL FOR FOLLOWING YOUR HEART
